#########################
Create Confusion Matrices
#########################
|TestStatus| |PyPiStatus| |BlackStyle|


Make and organize your confusion-matrices.

- Histogramming
- Estimator for uncertainty based on count-statistics.
- Naming of axes to not confuse the axes.
